COMMENTS.Defaults: Shipped Defaults are hardcoded using values in DowncastCacheController.php. To use, rename this file, or set setting to null, or comment out DowncastCacheController::setup() in index.php
COMMENTS.Are changes not taking effect?: To see changes after a a configuration update, clear or disable browser cache and try again
COMMENTS.ENABLED: True, Enables Caching; False disables caching
COMMENTS.CLEANUP: If set to true, will delete all cache files with each page request.
COMMENTS.TIMEOUT: Time, in seconds, before a page's cache will time out
COMMENTS.PATH: Absolute or relative directory path where cache will be created. Must have 0777 permissions and contain a directory called cache.storage. If the path is not explicitly set in this file, or set to null, the web server's temp directory will be used. See Examples below
COMMENTS.Warning: readdir(): Error: You'll get this error if CLEANUP is set to true but PATH is invalid or permission to delete files is denied
